product.title: Kalmar Deluxe Slate - Venetian Blind
product.description: Kalmar slate deluxe is the perfect way to allow your home to really make a statement. With a rich variety of greys that allow you to see something different every time you look at them you'll be able to coordinate with your favourite shades as you reinvent any room in the house. Think about the contrasts you can create with light walls and floors and darker eye-catching accessories like scatter cushions and a lampshade.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Grey Roller Blind
relproducts.description: A highly popular range, loved by their customers for its simplicity and value for money, their stockholmfabrics come in a wide range of colours suitable for all rooms including kitchens and bathrooms. This grey roller blind blends perfectly with any style or taste, whether your decor is on the modern, minimalist side or if you prefer to add bright and bold accessories. This roller blind with accompanying white components and grey fabric colour is a easy and quick way to update your window.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Rock Grey Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Their moisture-resistant, stockholm rock roller blind is a stunning mid grey hue. It's a modern, on trend colour choice & will be a perfect finishing touch for your window. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including the option of a rust free chain so you can get just the perfect finishing touches for your window. This blind also comes with 5 year guarantee as standard, giving you peace of mind that you blind is built to last.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Mid Grey Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Stockholm mid grey roller blinds are a beautiful contemporary cool grey colour. A timeless grey colour that will compliment most color palettes within the home or office. Their roller blinds can be manufactured with smooth control chains which ensures you get the desired finish for your space. Also, their made to measure blinds come with a 5 year guarantee providing additional peace of mind when investing in this product.

relproducts.description: Their oslo blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finishand colour match blockout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home. Still, at the forefront of fashion, the fabric makes sumptuous roman blinds and curtains. The faux suede deluxe powder blue roman blind in a lovely colour is an excellent way to transform your home at an affordable price. relproducts.title: Faux Suede Deluxe Black Roman Blind
relproducts.description: Simple yet stylish the black faux suede roman blind is the perfect finish for both the modern contemporaryhome. Their faux suede collection comes in a variety of colours which include pinks, naturals and tones of colour which are highly sought after in todays interiors. All their blinds are made to measure to your measurements right here in west yorkshire. Their skilled seamstresses hold a wealth of experience, so you can be assured that a quality roman blind will be manufactured and delivered to you.

relproducts.description: Chic and on trend for today's living, the new grey faux suede blind will enhance your room interior. Its trending grey tone brings a crisp classy look that is perfect for any room in your home. Pair it perfectly with several colour palettes, including blush pinks, mustard yellows, and whites. This blind is great along side co-ordinating and contrasting curtains to give your window that perfect look.

relproducts.title: Origin Brushed Silver - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The ultra-metallic brushed silver from the origin range is the height of utilitarian style. With a polished, near-matte finish, the blind's aluminium slats are sturdy and hardwearing, and easily controlled using the colour-matched cords that hang from the sides. The beauty of the brushed silver is that it can be used as part of a room's central colour scheme, or incorporated as a simple accent, in the same way as a fixture or fitting might.

relproducts.title: Kolsva Deluxe Wengi - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Transfix your guests with the distinguishing and dynamic kolsva deluxe in wengi, where bold sophistication meets classic, craftsman excellence. This dramatic, twilight shaded blind with coordinating supports and decorative trimmings, generates a demanding window arrangement with modern components and valuable utility. Fashion a creative master bedroom with striking characteristics and vivid colour by suspending the wengi against a vibrant teal background.

relproducts.title: Kolsva Deluxe Sheesham - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: For a homely and convivial dcor scheme containing authentic, basswood timber and extra designer detail, elect the kolsva deluxe sheesham for its wholesome, conker shade. Sourced from sustainable forests, these craftsman-built, quality louvres, with matching supports and decorative ladders, produce a glamorous window dressing that is both conservational and convenient. Generate a luxury living space by corresponding the sheesham with similarly toned, deep furnishings, and walnut-hued flooring.

relproducts.title: Kolsva Deluxe Tawny Oak - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: For an authentic window dressing absolute in fashioning a striking, designer look, choose the kolsva deluxe in tawny oak for its craftsman quality louvres and elegant, coordinating ladders. The grouping of naturally toned timber with matching pelmets and rails creates a compelling feature that allows flexibility to suit your shading and privacy preferences. As the tawny oak features a quality, anti-cracking and warping component, fashion a distinctive dcor scheme in your kitchen, with similarly shaded surfaces.

relproducts.title: Kolsva Deluxe Pale Oak - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Turning your chosen space into a celebration of function and form is all about adding something unexpected. With the deluxe version of the ever-popular pale oak offering from the kolsva range you'll be able to enjoy a calming natural colour that accentuates the free-flowing beauty of wood grain. There's nothing better than a lounge that allows you to switch off and put your feet up is there? With pale oak hanging with pride in your window you'll be able to create a theme with nothing more than a lightly coloured rug and matching ceramic table lamp.
